text: أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَبَؤُاْ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ فَذَاقُواْ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهِمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

translation.en: Has there not come to you the news of those who disbelieved before? So they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment
translation.id: Apakah belum sampai kepadamu (orang-orang kafir) berita orang-orang kafir dahulu? Maka mereka telah merasakan akibat buruk dari perbuatannya dan mereka memperoleh azab yang pedih
